data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in San Juan, Dominican Republic to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of San Juan, Dominican Republic
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of San Juan to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of San Juan.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of San Juan, Dominican Republic.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Japanese people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Japanese people know you.
Spirit, train the church of San Juan, Dominican Republic to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Father, help the 26,133 believers in San Juan to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who are far from you in San Juan. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

location.name: San Juan
location.cities_list: San Juan de la Maguana, Las Matas de Farfán, Juan de Herrera, Cercado Abajo, Vallejuelo
